title: (5470) Montalegre - 15 Rua Miguel Torga

title: (5470-204) Montalegre - Rua Padre José Alves
description: Free parking no facilities

title: (5470-204) Montalegre - 200 Rua João Rodrigues Cabrilho
description: Place located on the site of the fair. Inaccessible on market day, Thursday every 2 weeks.

title: (5470) Montalegre - Rua Antȯnio José Almeida
description: Roadside parking, convenient for town centre. No problem overnight. No services.

title: (5470) Montalegre - 17 Rua Colmeias
description: Free parking

name: Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
title: (5470) Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
title_short: (5470) Capela de Nossa Sra. das Treburas
description: Amazing viewpoint to the dam and mountains. Easy access, just a dirty road going up. Small chapel on the top. A lot of space. No services

title: (5470) - 43 EM509
description: Public spring and a bathing possibility 1km along the street

title: (5470) - Travassos da chã
description: This is called a bivouac alone in the world, several possible locations, a few places on the left arriving from the side of the White Rock; much more room and flatter on the right when arriving. More windy too that day! Attention, lake level probably much higher in winter, bivouac may not be accessible!

title: (5470) - Unnamed Road
description: Wild camping at the edge of a lake.

name: Parque de Campismo de Penedones
title: () Parque de Campismo de Penedones
description: Camping Penedone Lake view, superb installation, created in 2005, about twenty pitches for camper, quiet and fresh air, relaxing, stroll from the campsite GR117

title: () - EM514
description: Quiet near a small dam, barbecue and water point available. Attention, water point (no water) out of season.

title: (5470) Morgade -
description: My CC is 7 m for information - Gently go down a small stony path which will allow you to discover a great place far from everything - relaxing - Thank you for leaving this place clean! I felt obligated to pick up the trash. To keep this beautiful place.

title: (5470) - EM525
description: Very calm and good for fishing

title: (5470-083) São Pedro - 2 EM514
description: Picnic with easier access. Water and barbecue. Quiet night!

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 1 Rua Cemitério
description: Small village to cross before accessing a platform stabilized ground for vans and vans. Parking day night without noise except for boat launch, swimming at the top especially when it is 39 degrees.

title: (5470) Padornelos -
description: At the top of Sierra de Larouco, amazing place, with 360° view if well placed! A bit cold during night but otherwise,i recommend! You can take off by paragliding (if you are into it)!! Enjoy!

title: (5470-323) Negrões - 3 Rua Corga da Cruz
description: Albufeira Pisão Dam. place next to the reservoir of the Pisão dam. Dirt road with loose stones. good place to swim and stay overnight. the climb on the road can be difficult depending on the time of year.

title: (5470-323) - 1 Rua das Pereiras
description: You can park here and stay for 24 hours with no stress, waking up near river.

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
Boat launch path on the lake. Away from the main road. Dirt and pebble path easy to access for a van not easy for a CC to see.
Alone in the world at the water's edge the bells of the sheep and the waves for only noises. No services.

title: (5470) Antigo -
description:
A truly rejuvenating and idyllic place. Quiet and beautiful.
Very passable dirt road for a van.
Very windy in July, we were very very cold despite our sweaters.

title: () - 77 EM520
description: Spectacular and calm place, surrounded by nature. You can park in various locations with various views.

title: (5470-526) Montalegre - 6 Rua Santo António
description: Parking lot for a community soccer pitch. Wide open and flat. Good for around 4 motorhomes. Easy access. Wake up to the roosters!

title: (5470) Viade de Baixo - Unnamed Road
description: Short stretch of rocky road to get there, but possible with big vans. Quiet place, all by yourself. Would definitely recommend!

title: (5470-466) Serraquinhos - 30 Rua Central
description: Nice water, it fills 13l very fast! Just to fill bottles not for a hose to the van.

title: () - EM520
description: This is a awesome place on the top of the mountain range with a great view to the dam. There are no services, just nature. There are paths till here but the access is a little difficult for bigger vans I think, because there’s not much space to turn around. We stayed for one night, it was pitch black because there’s no light around but super calm and we felt secure. I don’t recommend it in windy days because here on top you really feel it in your motor home. But the views during the day are just breathless!

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias -
description:
Nice place to sleep surrounded by nature outside the village, but I don't know if it's legal to stay for the night.
No services at all.

title: (5470) - Rua Cabeça do Castro
description: Mountain village type, very beautiful point of view. Restaurant Eira Tavern with magnificent panoramic view at 50 m ideal for a night and a day of visit. Water point in the village below attention to the access, go first on foot

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias -
description: An ideal dirt road to stop for lunch or to spend the night. The highway is close. We go without 4x4 but better with 4x4.

title: (32688) A Xironda -
description: Artificial lake with parking area for about 10 vehicles. It has picnic tables and a children's play area. Nearby, about 30 minutes walk or 5 minutes by car, there is a town A Xironda with bars and a small supermarket. There are several hiking or mountain biking routes to do in the area.

title: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 22 Avenida São Rosendo
title_short: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 22 Avenida São Rosendo
description:
Free parking place in the beautiful village of Pitões de Júnias. Great restaurant in the village, perfect for hiking and mtb, with famous waterfall close by.
500m from a bakery !

title: (5470) Pitões das Junias - R. São Roque
title_short: (5470) Pitões das Junias - R. São Roque
description: I believe it’s the parking facility for the Pitões das Júnias cascata trail so parking lot it is. Spot is far from levelled. The view is magnificent and during the evening and night we only had 1 visitor which was a herd with 4 cows.

title: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 12 Rua de Chães
title_short: (5470-370) Pitões das Junias - 12 Rua de Chães
description: Recent park with picnic tables, near the restaurant and the bakery. Has water, free of charge, but no other services.

title: (5470) Tourém -
description: The place by the bridge is a picnic spot, this one is far enough from the road and with acces to water. Unfortunately, fishermans are messy kind, however, the road is in relatively good shape and the place is huge.

title: (5470) - EM513
description: Lovely spot just outside Tourem

title: (5470) Barragem de Paradela - 362 EM308
description: Parking with nice view of the lake. Bar nearby.

title: (5470) - EM308
description: Large space at the lake with a breathtaking view, possibility of taking a bath before taking the road we spent a quiet night. By cons against the path is quite steep, if you have a big campsite because it is better to go see on foot before committing. Ideal for those who like to sleep alone in nature.

title: (5460) Boticas - N103
description: Picnic area with nice view and continuous source of drinking water. slight slope Calm at night, traffic resumes around 7:30 am Let's try to keep the place clean.

title: (32632) Baltar - Unnamed Road
description: Fluvial area of ​​meadow, barbecues and granite tables, wooded and quiet, at least in October, when I visit. There are no services of any kind but it is at a short distance from the town of Baltar, where there are a restaurant and a shop. The place is ideal to sleep and enjoy a walk through nature. It is fit for motorhomes.

title: (5470) - 4 Rua do Biqueiro da Cancela
description:
Recommended only for vans and smaller vehicles due to narrow access road and limited space at site. Great view, sheltered from the wind by the chapel and a beautiful waterfall down the road. Be careful the road down to the waterfall looks driveable but will become difficult further down, you will definitely need elevated ground clearance, 4WD  helps. We walked and got a lift back up from an SUV. Place is used during the day for parking by local visitors of the waterfall. 
No service (except water) , please keep clean.

title: (5460) - 55 R311
description: A flat location, ideal for spending a night alone and green. starting point for a nice family stroll in a bucolic place. No service but it is not the goal.

title: (5460) Sapiãos - Bairro Tornadouro
description: A space for relaxation and leisure, possibility of parking day and night for free, very quiet

title: (5460) Sapiãos - N103
description: A dead end hidden behind bushes and trees not too close to the road. An ok place to sleep for the night.

title: (5460) - 46 N103
description: Lovely views of hills and mountains. Very peaceful. Surrounded by nature. Next to a road, 10 metres away, but quiet, particularly at night.

title: (5470) - EM308
description: Nice platform at the end of the short path. It is in plain sight from the road though.

name: Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda
title_short: (5460-304) Parque de Campismo - Virgílio António de Miranda

title: (5460-304) Boticas - 55 Avenida Chaves
description: Car park away from the football stadium. Ideal for a quiet night

title: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
title_short: (5460) Boticas - 14 Largo Nossa Senhora da Livração
description: Free paarking, police station next door. beutifull place.historical village. No facilities. Everything you need get around.

title: (5470-333) Outeiro - EM308
description: Small clearance on the side of the road facing the mountains! Very quiet, 3 cars between 9pm and 6am

title: (5460) Seirraos - CM1038
description: Near Boticas Magnificent Mirradouro point of view for a stopover or a night, unfortunately, part of the forest is burnt but the view is beautiful.

title: () - N103
description: A short part of the old n103 road. huge panoramic point on the lake. very calm. great for one night. Access on foot in 1 min on a small cove for swimming.

title: (5470) Pondras - N103
description: Very good spot to spend a night with a beautiful view of the lake. Path partly asphalt to descend then turn left. The suite along the lake is earth / pebbles but stable. Very calm place.

title: (5460) Cerdedo -
description: A former football field, terrain is flat. Beautiful sunrise and sunset. Very quiet and good 4G reception.

title: (5470) Paradela -
description: Beautiful quiet, flat parking with a wonderful view over the mountains. Recommended for 4x4 vehicles!

title: (5470) Pondras -
description: A nice spot near the water of Rabagão River. Place for 2, maybe 3 vehicles. Easy to reach, but some trees and rocks in the road there, 4x4 recommended.

title: (5470-504) Venda Nova -
description: You can park on an unused road with a view over the water. There is also a beach a few hundred meters away, but I have not been there. There is, however, waste material along the road.

title: (5470) Venda Nova - 15 N103
description: Ample parking at the foot of the road, good for a stop along the way, even overnight. Bar-cafe next door. Little night traffic on the road that does not prevent a good night's sleep.

title: (5400) Ervededo - EM507
description: A very pleasant place with a beautiful view of the Vale. Excellent to stop for a picnic.

title: (5470) - 2 CM1020
description: ! To go to 7 Lagoas (7 Lagoons) ! To get a place you need to go during the night or really earlier or you won´t get a chance ! We only spent the day there so that we could go to the lagoons but it should have no sound !

title: (5470) - CM1021
description: Place a little in the woods in the shade, ideal for small van, parking possible next to motorhome, quiet night from 21h more car (road near but it's okay), calm night some midges leaving the sun lying down, plus there is a small source of drinking water at 50m!

title: (32880) Mugueimes - 17 Rúa da Moreira
description: Newly created area. Perfect area to enjoy nature, with a small town that is the town hall and a large reservoir with recreational areas. The electricity is paid, one euro an hour and only accepts coins

title: (5470) - 3 Rua Ferreiro
description: Pleasant and secluded picnic area, leaning parking! Lots of locations.

title: (32879) Lobios - 20 OU-1206
description: Small picnic area, 2 tables, magnificent view, near an uncrowded road. To visit: museum village of Puxeido with impressive granite architecture and A Cela. Swimming in Las Pozas das Olas.

title: (5470) Venda Nova - 98 Rua Boavista
description: Fountain full of water at the hose possible.

title: (32880) Muíños - OU-302
description: Small stop for picnic in full autonomy on the side of the road but separated by a rock, seen beautiful, few passages.

title: (32880) Muíños - OU-302
description: Magnificent view for a little break.

title: (32879) Lobios - OU-1206
description: Picnic area. Flat parking along a quiet road. In a landscape of granite chaos.

title: (5470) - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent ! A picnic area surrounded by nature, with a pretty fountain, under the holm oaks around the small chapel of Señora da Neves. Mid June 2021: We spent a very quiet night there, singing birds We saw only one lady come to do her gym in the evening A beautiful peaceful place with tables and mossy granite benches It is undoubtedly advisable for the off season.

title: (5425-011) Anelhe -
description: Relaxed place to stand. No facilities. But very peaceful

title: () - EM308-4
description: Perfect place for naps and lunch or dinner right next to the dam.

name: Cámping O Corgo Muíños
title: (32880) Cámping O Corgo Muíños
description: The campsite is called O Corgo, there are lots of spaces and electricity and wifi is included in the price. Google Maps called it campamento mar muinos. Staff and facilities are excellent for the price

title: (32880) Muíños - 24 Lugar Mugueimes
description: Large car park next to the marsh, river beach, etc. Without services, we have very close 1.5 km Muiños, a loading and unloading area. There is no prohibition sign for caravans. Car 7m without problem parking in battery and online. Showers and toilets.

title: (32643) Galicia - OU-302
description: Parking bay 10m away from a street with little traffic. Great view of the valley and the mountains opposite. A little above 2 other, similar bays.

title: (4850) Campos - N103
description: spring water

title: (32846) Bande - 19 OU-540
description: Beautiful place near the river and terms and archaeological site. Shaded tables small bar / catering.

title: (32846) Bande - 19 OU-540
description: Area for motorhomes and campers, quiet place, protected by UNESCO and Natura 2000, please respect the environment for the good of all. Roman baths 10 minutes walk. Maximum stay 72 hours, it is forbidden to park vans not approved as residential vehicles, it is forbidden to turn on generators from 11:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. so as not to disturb the rest of the users of the area (be careful, it is a natural park), respect the environment, do not You can make a campfire or camping under administrative sanction.

title: (5470-013) - 2 Largo 1° de Maio
description: Small car park in the center of the village with a fountain to fill up with water. Two affordable restaurant one upstairs with a nice terrace one downstairs with a view of the water.

title: (5400) Curalha - Bairro Reboreda
description: On a paved portion of the road, quiet even if you can hear a bit of cars on the new road. Stop lunch, but could very well do it for the night. Slight slope, no setvices. a shaft to take shade

title: (32848) Bande - OU-540
description: A narrow path leads off the main road. The driveway is a bit overgrown and very uneven but can be driven on without problems for a T4. If you drive a long way along the path, you end up at a reservoir. It is wonderfully quiet and idyllic! We were all alone except for a few pedestrians who were happy to see us. Otherwise, the path looks more like hardly any people are walking by. You can swim in the lake. Right and left you are surrounded by bushes. During the night an animal visited us and sniffed the bus with curiosity.

title: (32846) Bande - 16 OU-540
description: Place at the lake, beautiful lake view, very quiet,  the presence of a hot spring arranged to soak, no services

title: (4850) Ruivães - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to park right in front of the entrance to a short path to see the bridge and Misarela waterfall.

title: (5470) - CM1021
description: Small parking place next to the road to Cabril, but flat and quiet at night. Picnic tables and water are situated along access to the lake. Nice view to the lake.

title: (4850) Lamalonga - EM623
description: Giant stone tables in a large cork oak forest. Possibility of finding your flat place to park or spend the night. Quiet. Lonely. Perfect.

name: GERESGREENPARK
title: (5470) GERESGREENPARK
description: Great campground with a charming and helpful owner. You can get lots of information on where to go and where to visit, including the history of the area.

title: (32897) Ermille - 55 Lugar Hermille
description: Nice piece of flat terrain just by the lake, narrow entrance from the main road near the gas station surrounded by nature. idilyc place.

title: (32689) Cualedro - 8 Alameda do Cruceiro
description: Water point right on the street

title: (5470) - 2 N308
description: Tranquility In the middle of nature

title: (5470) Pincâes - Rua da Cascata
description: Finally water !! In the middle of the village, next to the laundry a tap with water from nearby sources. No emptying possible, unless you have dirty water but "clean"? using only bio-degradable products. In each small village you will find faucets with spring water.

title: (32840) Xordos - OU-1201
description: 2 picnic tables and a natural drinking fountain, with a magnificent view of the mountains and the lake... peaceful for a lunch break!

title: (4860) - Unnamed Road
description: Park at a wonderfull  fluvial beach, picnic tables, grill ,bath, very calm And peacefull place, no problems staying at night!

title: (4850) Campos - EM623
description: The parking lot is located on a small street. It is lined with trees and offers plenty of space. I haven't stayed here so I don't know how busy the traffic is. However, the road seems quiet.

title: (32870) Lobios - 9 Estrada de Portugal
description: Place to park and sleep, very quiet. There is a city stadium, machines for weight training, tables for eating and green spaces.

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-1202
description: Small picnic area near Lobios. A place in the shade and flat under the walnut trees (avoid parking from mid-September to mid-October: walnut fall) for a vehicle of less than 2.8m and other places. A few tables, barbecue and drinking water. View of the mountain ranges of the Baixa Limia Serra do Xures Natural Park. Provide mosquito repellent. Swimming possible 200m below in the dam lake. Respect for nature and the inhabitants.

title: (5470) Cabril -
description: Large picnic area located by the road (but very little traffic) with a nice view of the valley. Several tables and trash can available. The parking lot is flat at the top but very sloping lower. (For more shade in the summer, a small parking area is available at the next turn at 400m if you continue on this road towards Fafiao to the west)

title: (32870) Lobios - OR-312
description: Picnic area with 3 tables, next to the road, lots of space to park the van where you can see it. Great mountain views! no water, no services.

title: (32895) Lobios - 5 OU-312
description: RV park 200 meters from the Balneario de Lobios. Park the mobile homes in front of the pool instead of in front of the houses so as not to disturb the neighbors. Several hiking trails start from the parking lot. The water and drain is next to the house, the surface doesn't sink to 72 hours just through and it's not flat, that's on a slope or chocked it doesn't look good nor does it take a TV signal. The previous height limit of 2 m is wrong, I can park well there in the upper part with a height of 3.8 m and turn well with a length of 9.8 m. More than 10 WoMo or caravans fit.

title: (32895) A Devesa - 25 Lugar a Devesa
description: Water fountain, little pressure but you can enjoy a picnic while you wait for your tanks to fill

title: (4850-341) Braga - N103
description:
Unassuming parking next to the road.
The real draw is the really nice swimming and picnicking area on northern side of the bridge with a little snack bar and a natural pool 30x100m.
Perfect on a hot summer day.
You can stay over night on the car park it is however next to the road and offers little charm.

name: O Moinho
title: (5400) O Moinho
description: Near a river, in the parking lot of a restaurant where you do not have to go but you eat very well. Owners speak French and friendly. we can stay the time we want. We will come back.

title: (32895) Torneiros - 15 Lugar Torneiros
description: Large space for camping, fire possible, River 15m but difficult car access

title: (32695) Trasmiras - 212 N-525
description: Repsol gas station with service area, water, sewage, free vacuum cleaner and cleaning fee

title: (5425) Vidago - 21 Rua Faria de Morais
description: We parked here to visit Vidago, it's possible to park over night (no prohibited signs)

title: (32870) Lobios - Parking zone de loisirs
description: Parking of the recreation area (disused?), Near the pool. Very calm despite the frogs. Lets avoid the thermal baths of Torneiros, crowded car parks

title: (32630) Ginzo de Limia - 9 Avenida de Portugal
title_short: (32630) Ginzo de Limia - 9 Avenida de Portugal
description: Perfect camping area to park and spend the night. shade and quiet

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - Rúa Jesús Carlos Romero Nieto
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - Rúa Jesús Carlos Romero Nieto
description: Attached to the toural park, excellent parking with shade in summer, cafeterias, hardware store, bike repair, bakery and wines a two-minute walk away. PROHIBITED ON 14 AND 27 BY FAIR.

title: (4850-341) Ruivães -
description: Very nice spot surrounded by nature and near the lake. Most of the road is paved, but it may be difficult for big vans. If in doubt, try by foot first.

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 10 Rúa Río Sil
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 10 Rúa Río Sil
description: Self-service laundry. Lots of parking space.

title: (32895) Lobios - OR-312
description:
Nice place to stay for one night. There's  a table and a small stream coming down the valley. The road isn't too busy at night. 
There's also a footpath leading up to the border and continues from there to the waterfalls and the lake.

title: (5400) Chaves - 39 Avenida Trindade
description:
LIDL parking area for motorhome.
3 places

name: Camping Quinta do Rebentão
title: (5400-756) Camping Quinta do Rebentão
description: Quinta do Rebentão campsite. Very nice and cheap, restaurant and baker who leaves every morning at 9am.

title: (5400-569) Chaves -
description:
Laundry service.
Open all year from 8:00 to 22:00.
Self service. Easy parking in the area while doing the laundry.
Across the street from the Hospital.

title: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas
title_short: (32689) Cualedro - 173 Autovía de las Rías Bajas
description: Private area in Galp service station. Well located and with parking for sleeping. Restaurant next door with very good cuisine and village with all services a few km. Perfect place to know the area.

title: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 4-8 Camiño da Cerámica
title_short: (32630) Xinzo de Limia - 4-8 Camiño da Cerámica
description: Regional parking allowed at night, without service, very quiet and Central. Passage of the local police who is watching.

title: (5400-563) Chaves -
description: Day parking near the wall and the thermal area.

title: (4850) Vieira do Minho - N103
description: Quiet place to spend the night with a superb view, flat, at the edge of a gravel / pebble path over which no one passes. Impossible to go down to the lake with a non 4x4 VW van, but on foot you can be there in 15 min.

title: (5400) Chaves - Rua do Lazer
description: Small parking lot not far from the water and easy to access. A family spent the night there. we just day parking because the others were busy because of the Gallo Roman festival

title: (5470) Fafião - Unnamed Road
description:
A very beautiful place to visit and walk to the nature
have a beautiful waterfall down the trail

title: (5400-180) Chaves - 25 Rua do Sal
description: Public toilets, right on the side of the city hall.

title: (32860) Asperelo e Olín -
description: Next to some erratic boulders with great views. good accessibility by forest road, some ground clearance needed.

title: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
title_short: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
description: This space is located in the center of the large garden town of Chaves and in your environment has many sporting activities, a hiking and biking track. The Tâmega River is 20 meters and the center of the city is 200 meters.

title: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
title_short: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
description: Park not in the city center. Optimal performance of all.

title: (5400-517) Chaves - 5 Alameda Tabolado
description: Free parking on the street. Next to nice park and restaurants.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: On the road (very little frequented) at the edge of the river. There is a picnic table, a barbecue and a trash can. Without services. Small parking space, today only a place next to the barbecue. On the other side of the road, there is more space but it is blocked by a band

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 7 Rua Tabolado
description: Laundromat - be careful on Sundays-

title: (5470-017) - Rua do Couto
description: Tasty water source, zero chlorine taste.

title: (5400-541) Chaves - 15 Alameda Trajano
description: Nice parking lot on the edge of the calm water come at the end of the evening to have space.

title: (5400-355) Chaves - 26 Rua Longras
description: A large and very quiet car park. Very level. Near the town centre. The other parking places indicated here are no longer available. I had no problem here.

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 22 Alameda Trajano
description: Public parking next to the Tâmega river in a dead end street. Apparently calm. Unbeatable views. Near bar restaurant in the same parking

title: (5400) Chaves - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Stayed on a Friday night. The car park was a combination of drag racing and rally car racing until 2am.    Possibly ok during the week.  We moved the following day!  The location is great with a short and pretty walk along the river to the old town.

title: (5400-017) Chaves - 10 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Large car park, which allows you to visit the center and the Roman bridge by walking about 300m along the water.
Nothing prevents you from sleeping but very attractive

title: () Lobios - OR-312
description: Free parking lot just after/beforoe the nationa park. During the day it could be full, the night it is empty...perfect for the night. There is a recycle bin, pleas use it!

title: (5470) - 6 Rua dos Alambiques
description: Strategic stopover when driving in the National Park roads. No services. Enough space for 2 motorhomes. A walk through Fafião village is worth. We didn't sleep here, so don't know if overnight is ok.

title: (5400-323) Chaves - 6 Rua Caneiro
description:
Outside self service laundry in E Leclerc carpark. Cash ONLY.
Washing machine.
Dryer.

title: () Chaves - Alameda Galinheira
description: Chaves car park, authorized from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. to visit the city.

title: (4850) Vieira do Minho - N103
description: Nice and quiet place. There are tables and benches available, as well as a fireplace and bins. Not suitable for large motorhomes as the driveway will be too narrow.

title: (32618) Albarellos - 2A Rúa Fontiñas
description: Without any service, but ample parking with no problem of length or height. Side tables to eat. It is parking of some summer swimming pools are very good and at a very good price. We stopped for one night, the next day we used the pools and everything without a problem. Of course, little else to see in the town, small but beautiful.

title: (5400-505) Chaves - Alameda de la Galinheira.
description: Free parking near the old town right on the river. There is a park right there for walking the dog.

title: (32631) Boado -
description: CEPSA service station. Showers Trucks

title: (4850) Rio Cávado - Unnamed Road
description: Location with great views of the park, not flat terrain, holds necessary, very quiet night not a noise, despite the road below, beware of the wasps that are cooked meat (it happened quite often everywhere), other than that it is night not an insect with lit lamp, another bigger and flatter location exists higher on the same track, but much more expo in the wind

title: (32870) Aceredo -
description: Currently the once submergwd town of Antiga Aldeia Aceredo is accessible and offers some amazing, albeit morbid views. access is by a somewhat steep dirt road, so 4x4 highly recommended. several places to park, some flat, some with an incline.

title: (5400) Quinta de Montalvões - EM506
description: Small side street from the main street. Located near the motorway. Quiet night spent except for passing cars. Great for a quick and short night.

title: (32860) - Unnamed Road
description: As Perdices recreational area. About 2.5 km from O Casal (Entrimo). River beach and start of different trails. With bins. Very quiet place, you can only hear the flow of water from the river and the song of the little birds.

title: (4850) - Unnamed Road
description: Low roadside. Quiet. it climbs but calm is assured. a lot of similar places on the road that leads to this point

title: (5470) Fafião - Unnamed Road
description: It's quite a big flat ground but beware of the complicated road at the end. A water tap is attached to a rock on site. There is a small recess on the left side that can be easily hidden. We had a great night there, we were not disturbed. No noise as far enough away from the main road. This place is driving near the falls. When leaving the parking lot, it is better to drive to the left, even if the navigation system says to the right. Road gets very bad and only for off-road vehicles.

title: (5470-017) Montalegre - CM1361
description: Good space with tables and a beautiful view over the Salamonde lagoon.

title: (4850) - Unnamed Road
description: Gravel track clean ass not jolting but it can climb a little, beautiful view, side sunset may bcp wind, small flat view of the pylons. flat terrain.

title: (4850) Salamonde - M103-4
description:
Perfect place to stay one night. Very quiet. There are no services but the views are beautiful. No streetlight.
This is a parking space to see the waterfall that I really recommend

title: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
title_short: (32636) Xinzo de Limia - Pista de Morgade
description: Service station with gray discharge (very small chest) and black (perfect). The water has a padlock. I guess you have to ask at the gas station for the key. Reporting I guess it will be free. Very large esplanade, truck parking

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-1207
description: Parking for a camper, access to the lake, no service.

title: (32870) Aceredo - OU-540
description: Parking, no ban on mobile homes, with a view of the village of Aceredo, which was flooded 30 years ago. We stand here with our camper for one night. Right on the street, quiet at night.

title: (32613) Oímbra - Carretera de Oimbra
description: Picnic area at the edge of a shady stream. Barbecues available, small tirolienne and fitness trail.

title: (32860) Entrimo - Unnamed Road
description: Water fountain with a tap outlet with a large thread. If you have the appropriate thread ideal for filling water. Negative point the unevenness of the road to fill the tank

title: (5400) Chaves - N103-5
description: Parking at the Ecovia Tamega in Outeiro Seco, quiet at the water's edge

title: (32650) Vilar de Santos - 11 Aldea Barrio
description: Area with tables and a seat, a bit close to the road but wide enough to make a quiet stop and park next to the town

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description: View of the lake and parking possible for around twenty motorhomes. Little shade but quiet

title: (32860) Entrimo - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking But with incredible views of the Sierra del Xures.

title: (4850) Ruivães -
description: The place is ideal for one night. Traffic after 7 p.m. is almost non-existent. Relatively flat area.

title: (32860) Entrimo - 24 OU-1209
description:
Camper Area.
maximum parking 48 hours

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N312
description: Outside the campsite. Simple stop night, calm, flat.

title: (4845) - Unnamed Road
description: Only in the world (end of March). Parking near the waterfall do arado. 10 places. Beautiful view of the park Geres., No car came! Night prohibited.

title: (32697) Verín - 97 N-532
description: Picnic tables in the shade at the edge of the road. a lot of ground rubbish :-(

title: (4845) Vilar da Veiga - Unnamed Road
description: A very nice place, but only has space for 2 campers (mobile homes are not suitable). There are trash cans as well as spring water. There are 4 picnic tables under the trees. Absolutely quiet, near the waterfall and various hiking trails. In March it was deserted, but the temperature was very pleasant.

title: (5400-805) Vile Verde da Raia - 1 Rua Central
title_short: (5400-805) Vile Verde da Raia - 1 Rua Central
description: Place in the middle of a city, ideal to spend a night before or after crossing the border. Very calm. The ground depends on where you park but is sloping

title: (32860) Entrimo - OU-1212
description: Just below the official car park, there is another with 5 seats and picnic tables. Farther from the main road, quieter.

title: (32860) Entrimo - OU-1212
description: Small flat car parking place above village. Nice views of hills. Beside road but not busy

title: (5400) Vila Verde da Raia - N103-5
description: Large esplanade used only for major events, and the rest of the time open to parking. Very slightly sloping. Quiet if you stray a bit from the road.

title: (4845) Terras de Bouro - N308-1
description: Cove next to the road with great views. Surprisingly flat. There were a few cars passing by at night, but it is not a busy street. We stayed there 1 night. Alternative to the car park in the center of Geres, but walks do not leave directly from here.

name: Camping Quinta da Viña Grande
title: (32869) Camping Quinta da Viña Grande
description: Camping at the quinta da Viña Grande. Small, very pleasant campsite with about twenty shaded pitches. A charming welcome. Very clean sanitary facilities with hot water. Pitches Suitable for vans but a little tight for motorhomes.

title: (32849) Bande - OU-540
description: Small parking spot with water source. Possibility to have picknick.

title: (4845-072) Gerês - 219 CM1276
description: Ample parking in the city hermitage parking lot.  Difficult access for a section of the descent with a mobile home of more than 7 meters

title: (4845) - 53 CM1276
description: Parking of the mirador of the village of Ermida. The national gendarmerie told us as OK. Good for a night and nice for breakfast. Supermarket and bar 100 meters away.

name: Ermida Gerês Camping
title: (4845-072) Ermida Gerês Camping
description: Family campsite, owner speaks French and English very well and is very nice. Sanitary facilities very clean, no hot water in the basin for the dishes and no toilet seats. Camping very well located for visiting the waterfalls and hiking. Motorhome no more than 8 meters. Free WiFi.

title: (5400-632) Faiões - 42 Estrada Nacional
description: Large parking located next to a church (the bell does not ring the day). This parking will only allow you to park, but to spend the night quietly.

title: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
title_short: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
description: In a square very close to the center, this place, accessible to all sizes, is stabilized and shaded. Passing vehicles, noisy. Around a small chapel at the "Largo S. Mateus" cafe, the area is pleasant, calm and relaxing with 2 water points. However, you must choose its location to be level. No dedicated motorhome service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Secure wifi network at the cafe with the code 8dm8723r

title: (4850) - CM1395
description: Parking with beautiful views next to the Louredo cemetery, about 2/3 level spaces, but 100 meters further back there is a large esplanade with room for more with a certain difference in level. There is a container next to the cemetery gate and a water tap on the left side of it. The road to get there is narrow, check before starting the Google Maps routes through this area as they send you through impossible turns for medium-sized vans.

title: (32619) Monterrei - Rúa do Castelo
description: At the foot of Monterrei Castle near the town of Ciro. Beautiful setting, visit of the castle, hotel, restaurant and cafeteria. To discover. On grassy parking. Walking access to the castle because narrow streets.

title: (32600) Verín - 36 Rúa do Olivar
description: Very quiet area on the banks of the river and near the center, has tables and green area

title: (32619) Monterrei - 22 Lugar Monterrei
description: Area for parking and overnight stay bem embaixo do castelo. Quite amplo and calm. Suggested area for the castelo tourist information team. Very loving and informative. Obrigado

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description: Beautiful spot for a van alongside a abandoned road by the water. Follow the asphalt road next to the (amazing) ”Restaurante A Madalena”. No traffic. Very quiet. In the morning one fisherman came by. Caution: the road is wearing off so not recommended for big motorhomes. Perfect for a van. Shop and restaurant nearby.

title: (4845) - N308-1
description: Nice parking just 1km from Vila do Geres centre.

title: (4845) Caldas de Gerez - N308-1
description: Shaded picnic area with many stone and wooden tables. Attention difficult to park, winding road and cobblestones.

title: (32870) Lobios - OU-540
description:
A small path along the road which goes down to a nice location where there are 2 picnic tables.

A more than pleasant view of the lake and the small surrounding mountains.

The road is not far but is very lightly used at night. Even with a very light sleep you should not be disturbed.

No trash cans, so please take your trash away.

Little sun, located in the shade of the fir trees.

name: Vidoeiro Geres Camping
title: (4845) Vidoeiro Geres Camping
description: Campsite in the middle of nature. Beautiful with the river that flows there. Even possibility to immerse. There is room for campers, vans and tents. All facilities available.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - CM1132
description: Spectacular views. There are several taps and none of them have water. There are no containers, but there are litter bins nearby, in the church. Residential and quiet place.

title: (32600) Verín - 24I Avenida Luis Espada
description: Ample central parking, quiet place to visit Verin and its surroundings, you can visit its springs and highly recommended the casa do pulpo.

title: (32600) Verín - 17 Avenida Luis Espada
description: Self service launderette

title: (32631) Xinzo de Limia - 116 Solveira
description: Location for several vehicles, very quiet in the middle of the forest ...

title: (32619) Monterrei - Estrada de Vences
description: Small quiet place by the river. A dam allows to bathe there. There is room to park (several vans). A perfect stop!

title: (32600) Verín - 1A Camiño da Preguiza
description: Parking on the outskirts, next to the path that runs along the river. Very nice and quiet place.

title: (4845-075) - 131 Rua Tude de Sousa
description: Free parking day and night without service. Visit the spa town 3 minutes, very quiet at night.

title: (4845) Lugar da Ermida - 28 CM1276
description: Nice place with a nice view. There is even an area for the barbecue which is protected against the rain. Benches are also available. No overnight parking.

name: Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
title_short: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha
description: Quinta Rural, is located just before the town of Juguelhe. Beautiful camping farm with fantastic views over the valley and a nice hostess. Please call in advance if you want to come.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 765 N312
description: Service area and simple parking. Filling water with token and playground for small children, shops nearby, good walk on the bridge.

title: (32600) Verín - 37 Rúa Juan Guerra Valdés
description: More or less central parking, surrounded by buildings. Perfect for overnight

title: (4845) Vilar da Veiga - Unnamed Road
description: Follow the road that leads to the Pedra Bela mirador, arriving at the top, you will come across a magnificent view overlooking the valley. The viewpoint is right next to the small car park, breathtaking panorama. Ideal for landscaped van, may be too small for large motorhomes.  The only visits we had were tourists who came to enjoy the view.

title: (32600) Verín - 5 Rúa Travesía
description: Quiet sandy parking lot. Both own and along a path in the separations. There were some van and small motorhome. The big ones are more complicated

title: (32600) Verín - 10 Rúa Elvira Carrera
description: On the 3rd, 11th and 23rd of each month there is a fair (flea market) in the center of the town. Those days it is more complicated to park in the morning... also on those days there are pulpeiras selling octopus rations on the street

title: (32600) Verín - 2 Lugar Cabreiroa
description: Perfect to stop and drink free water from Cabreiroa water. There are tables and a lot of shadow.

title: (4850) Louredo -
description: Super spot in the mountains, accessible by a forest path (only van and light vehicle, not suitable for motorhomes). We arrive on a plateau with a magnificent view. Around the picnic area, several secluded places to sleep one night without being disturbed. Water point (no indication if it is drinkable or not)

title: (4980-020) - N304-1
description: Wild place at the water's edge accessible only by 4x4. space available for 2 to 3 vehicles.

title: (4845-075) Gerês - 40 Rua Arnaçó
description: Parking at the top of the town of Geres just above the cemetery and at the edge of the road. places with more or less slope. the seats are very large.
